name: Zoomba - Telepresent Dance
description:
a concept for a modern dance instruction application with customizable, rearrangeable, and modular ui elements for more user control when receiving class


created for UI Design class (CS 3750), conducted qualitative + quantitative user testing using Maze and gathered highly positive usability scores, presented as final project


Maze usability testing report found here. 93/100 usability.


Figma file can be viewed here.
